rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The relationship between Annotation and Body
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: hasBody

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The relationship between Annotation and Target
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: hasTarget

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The relationship between a oa:SpecificResource and the resource that it is a more specific representation of.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: hasSource

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The subject and object resources of the oa:equivalent relationship represent the same resource, but potentially have different metadata such as generator, generated and serialization format. oa:equivalent is a symmetrical relationship; if A oa:equivalent B, then it is also true that B oa:equivalent A.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: equivalent

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The timestamp at which the Source resource should be interpreted for the Annotation.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: when

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: FragmentSelector
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A resource which describes the segment of interest in a representation, through the use of the fragment identifier component of a URI.

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The object of the relationship is the agent, likely software, responsible for generating the serialization of the Annotation's graph.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: generator

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The time at which the oa:annotator created the Annotation.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: annotated

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The relationship between a oa:SpecificResource and a oa:Selector.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: hasSelector

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The relationship between a oa:SpecificResource and a oa:State resource
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: hasState

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The relationship between a oa:SpecificResource and a oa:Style
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: hasStyle

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The version of the model that was used for the Annotation. The object of the relationship is an RDF ontology describing the version of the Open Annotation Core namespace used. The Open Annotation namespace itself does not change, and hence this is not sufficient information to determine which version of the model is being used.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: modelVersion

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The time at which the agent referenced by oa:generator generated the first serialization of the Annotation graph, and any subsequent substantially different one. The graph MUST have changed for this property to be updated, and as such represents the last modified datestamp for the graph. This might be used to determine if the graph should be re-imported into a triplestore when discovered.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: generated

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A link to a copy of the Source resource's representation, appropriate for the Annotation.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: cachedSource

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The object of the relationship is a resource that identifies the agent responsible for asserting the triples in the Annotation graph. This may be either a human or software agent.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: annotator

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A resource which identifies part of another resource, a particular representation of a resource, a resource with styling hints for renders, or any combination of these.
rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: SpecificResource

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A resource which describes how to retrieve an appropriate representation of the Source resource for the Annotation.
rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: State

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A resource which describes the style in which the selection or resource should be rendered.
rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Style

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A document identified by an HTTP URI that describes, at least, the Body and Target resources involved in the annotation.
rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Annotation

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A resource which describes the segment of interest in a representation of a Source resource
rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Selector
